org.gearman.core
Enum GearmanPacket.Magic

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<GearmanPacket.Magic>
      org.gearman.core.GearmanPacket.Magic
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GearmanPacket.Magic>
Enclosing class:
GearmanPacket
public static enum GearmanPacket.Magic
extends java.lang.Enum<GearmanPacket.Magic>

An enumerator representing a gearman packet's magic code. The magic code is the first four bytes in the gearman packet's header. The value is "\0REQ" for request or "\0RES" for response.

Author:
isaiah.v
See Also:
gearman protocol

Enum Constant Summary
Enum Constant and Description
REQ
          A request packet is sent to the server to request a service.
Magic code = "\0REQ" = 5391697
RES
          A response packet is sent from the server to a client or worker as a response from handling a request.
Magic code = "\0RES" = 5391699
